verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) May the Lord <WH3068> answer <WH6030> you in the day <WH3117> of trouble! <WH6869> May the name <WH8034> of the God <WH430> of Jacob <WH3290> set <WH7682> you [securely] on high! <WH7682>
May He send <WH7971> you help <WH5828> from the sanctuary, <WH6944> And support <WH5582> you from Zion! <WH6726>
May He remember <WH2142> all <WH3605> your meal <WH4503> offerings, <WH4503> And find <WH1878> your burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> acceptable! <WH1878> Selah. <WH5542>
May He grant <WH5414> you your heart's desire, And fulfill <WH4390> all <WH3605> your counsel! <WH6098>

We will sing <WH7442> for joy <WH7442> over your victory, <WH3444> And in the name <WH8034> of our God <WH430> we will set <WH1713> up our banners. <WH1713> May the Lord <WH3068> fulfill <WH4390> all <WH3605> your petitions. <WH4862>

Now <WH6258> I know <WH3045> that the Lord <WH3068> saves <WH3467> His anointed; <WH4899> He will answer <WH6030> him from His holy <WH6944> heaven, <WH8064> With the saving <WH3468> strength <WH1369> of His right <WH3225> hand. <WH3225>
Some <WH428> [boast <WH2142>] in chariots, <WH7393> and some <WH428> in horses; <WH5483> But we will boast in the name <WH8034> of the Lord, <WH3068> our God. <WH430>
They have bowed <WH3766> down <WH3766> and fallen; <WH5307> But we have risen <WH6965> and stood <WH9388> upright. <WH9388>
Save, <WH3467> O Lord; <WH3068> May the King <WH4428> answer <WH6030> us in the day <WH3117> we call. <WH7121>
